get.summary: Get information of an account with its account number

parameters.name: bankCode
parameters.description:
Provide the bank of linked bank
Example: SWEN

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Provide the time with timestamp format
Example: 1673237427315

parameters.name: hmac
parameters.description:
Provide hmac to verify client, format: md5(data) | data:bankCode=${bankCode}&time=${time}&key=${SECRET_KEY}
Example: b228769b678318d2a6a0db525967f691

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description:
Provide the account number
 Example: 32xxxxxx

202.description: Error message, include these: Not found account, Not found bank, Time out, Not Allow
